com.google.gwt.widgetideas.table.client.overrides
Class HTMLTable.RowFormatter

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.widgetideas.table.client.overrides.HTMLTable.RowFormatter
Direct Known Subclasses:
FixedWidthFlexTable.FixedWidthFlexRowFormatter, SelectionGrid.SelectionGridRowFormatter
Enclosing class:
HTMLTable
public class HTMLTable.RowFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods used to format a table's rows.
